metadata.title: CVE-2024-26619 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: riscv:Fix module loading free order Reverse order of kfree calls to resolveuse-after-free error.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
